# 有道精品课

## 48

### 本题：DEI/BC  
\[\angle 1 = \angle 2 \quad \text{又} \quad \angle CA = \angle A\]

\[\triangle ADE \sim \triangle ABC\]

\[\frac{AP}{AB} = \frac{2}{3} \quad \text{为相似比}\]

\[\frac{S_{\triangle ADE}}{S_{\triangle ABC}} = \left( \frac{2}{3} \right)^2 = \frac{4}{9}\]

设  
\[S_{\triangle ADE} = 4X, \quad S_{\triangle ABC} = 9X\]

\[\therefore S_{\triangle ADE} \text{和} S_{\triangle DBCE} = 9X - 4X = 5X\]

\[\therefore \frac{S_{\triangle ADE}}{S_{\triangle DBCE}} = \frac{4X}{5X} = \frac{4}{5}\]
